Name: Fruit Cup Spritz
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of half orange slice, lemon slice & mint sprig.
Review: A light summery spritz with flavours reminiscent of Pimm's.
History: Created in 2013 by yours truly for Jamie's Italian Bar. Also see Fruit Cups and Pimm's
Nutrition: One serving of Fruit Cup Spritz contains 152 calories
